meanings.definition: To throw back light, heat, or sound without absorbing it.
meanings.sent1: The mirror was reflecting the sunlight into my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The lake was reflecting the bright sun on its surface.
meanings.sent3: The shiny metal was reflecting the light like a mini sun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was reflecting happiness and joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The glass building was reflecting the cityscape, creating a stunning view.

meanings.definition: To think deeply or carefully about something.
meanings.sent1: She was reflecting on her past mistakes and how to improve.
meanings.sent2: He spent hours reflecting on the meaning of life.
meanings.sent3: Reflecting on the mystery novel, she tried to solve the case herself.
meanings.sent4: His face reflecting deep concentration as he pondered the problem.
meanings.sent5: The student was reflecting on the exam questions, trying to remember the answers.

meanings.sent1: The calm lake was reflecting the mountains in its clear water.
meanings.sent2: The polished surface was reflecting a perfect image of the room.
meanings.sent3: The mirror was reflecting a distorted image of the room.
meanings.sent4: The screen was reflecting the movie, making it visible to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The polished silver was reflecting the face of the person looking at it.
